languages.text: "Это ужасно — столько лет жить под гнетом чудовища! Я помогу тебе его уничтожить".

traits.locale_text: "Это ужасно — столько лет жить под гнетом чудовища! Я помогу тебе его уничтожить".

languages.text: "It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I shall help you destroy it."
languages.original_text: "Это ужасно — столько лет жить под гнетом чудовища! Я помогу тебе его уничтожить".

traits.locale_text: "It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I will help you destroy it."
"It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I will help you destroy it."
"It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I will help you destroy it."
"It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I will help you destroy it."
"It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I shall help you destroy it."
"It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I shall help you destroy it."

languages.text: "Es muss schrecklich gewesen sein, so viele Jahre lang unter dem Joch eines Monsters zu leben! Ich werde Euch helfen, es zu zerstören."
languages.original_text: "It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I shall help you destroy it."

traits.locale_text: "Es muss schrecklich gewesen sein, so viele Jahre lang unter dem Joch eines Monsters zu leben! Ich werde Euch helfen, es zu zerstören."

languages.text: « Cela a dû être terrible de vivre sous le joug d'un monstre pendant tant d'années ! Je vais vous aider à l'éliminer. »
languages.original_text: "It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I shall help you destroy it."

traits.locale_text: « Cela a dû être terrible de vivre sous le joug d'un monstre pendant tant d'années ! Je vais vous aider à l'éliminer. »

languages.text: “你们肯定很痛苦吧，在那只怪物的桎梏之下生活了这么多年！我会帮助你消灭那只怪物。”
languages.original_text: "It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I shall help you destroy it."

traits.locale_text: “你们肯定很痛苦吧，在那只怪物的桎梏之下生活了这么多年！我会帮助你消灭那只怪物。”

languages.text: 「何年もの間、怪物に縛られて暮らすのは大変だっただろう！呪縛から解放されるように手を貸そう」
languages.original_text: "It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I shall help you destroy it."

traits.locale_text: 「何年もの間、怪物に縛られて暮らすのは大変だっただろう！呪縛から解放されるように手を貸そう」
「何年もの間、怪物に縛られて暮らすのは大変だっただろう！呪縛から解放されるように手を貸そう」

languages.text: «¡Debe de haber sido horrible vivir bajo el yugo de semejante monstruo todo este tiempo! Le ayudaré a destruirlo».
languages.original_text: "It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I shall help you destroy it."

traits.locale_text: «¡Debe de haber sido horrible vivir bajo el yugo de semejante monstruo todo este tiempo! Le ayudaré a destruirlo».

languages.text: "Bunca yıl bir canavarın boyunduruğunda kalmak felaket olsa gerek! Yok etmene yardım edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "It must have been terrible to live under a monster's yoke for so many years! I shall help you destroy it."

traits.locale_text: "Bunca yıl bir canavarın boyunduruğunda kalmak felaket olsa gerek! Yok etmene yardım edeceğim."
